Headline: #112 Vincennes/111th Temporary Reroute at 111th/Sacramento
ShortDescription: 112 Vincennes/111th buses are temporarily rerouted via 111th, Kedzie, 119th, Western and 111th due to, street blockage near 111th/Sacramento.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#112 Vincennes/111th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 111th, Kedzie, 119th, Western and 111th due to, street blockage near 111th/Sacramento.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Red Line Delays
ShortDescription: Red Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier unauthorized person on the tracks near Grand. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Red Line trains are running with residual delays following an earlier unauthorized person on the tracks near Grand. 

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
